casebody.data:
GREAT OAKS WATER COMPANY
v.
SANTA CLARA VALLEY WATER DISTRICT S231846 Supreme Court of California. JUNE 20, 2018 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan and Kruger, JJ.

Transferred to CA 6 after hold. The above-captioned matter is transferred to the Court of Appeal, Sixth Appellate District, with directions to vacate its decision and reconsider the cause in light of City of San Buenaventura v. United Water Conservation Dist. (2017) 3 Cal.5th 1191 , 226 Cal.Rptr.3d 51 , 406 P.3d 733 . (See Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.528(d).) Liu and Cuéllar, JJ., were recused and did not participate.
